name: tourin-web
description: Simple web tour library for React
author: Firly Afriansyah

scripts.release: npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:bump -- --release-as patch && git push --follow-tags && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:bump -- --release-as minor && git push --follow-tags && npm run release
scripts.release:major: npm run version:bump -- --release-as major && git push --follow-tags && npm run release
